log.error: Error importing XML: 'There is no XML format with name: 'XHTML-TRANSACTIONS' (ERR0206)' (ERR0257)

xmlText.p: BOSTON RED SOX — Designated RHP Ben Taylor for assignment. Agreed to terms with INF Eduardo Nunez on a one-year contract.
CHICAGO WHITE SOX — Assigned RHP Dylan Covey outright to Charlotte (IL).
MINNESOTA TWINS — Placed RHP Michael Pineda on the 60-day DL.
TAMPA BAY RAYS — Traded RHP Jake Odorizzi to Minnesota for SS Jermaine Palacios.<
LOS ANGELES DODGERS — Agreed to terms with 2B Chase Utley on a two-year contract.
MIAMI MARLINS — Assigned RHP Severino Gonzalez outright to New Orleans (PCL). Agreed to terms with 1B Eric Campbell on a minor league contract.
NEW YORK METS — Placed 3B T.J. Rivera on the 60-day DL. Ageed to terms with LHP Jason Vargas on a two-year contract.
PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES — Agreed to terms with LHP Fernando Abad on a minor league contract.<
NEW YORK RANGERS — Returned G Brandon Halverson to Hartford (AHL).
AHL — Suspended Rochester F Colin Blackwell two games.
HARTFORD WOLF PACK — Released G Drew Fielding from a professional tryout agreement. Signed D Desmond Bergin to a professional tryout agreement.<
